  • Method Details

    • addCuttingTool

      public int addCuttingTool​(String toolName, String toolType, String toolSeries, int toolTeeth, double toolLength)
      Parameters:
      toolName - - description for the tool
      toolType - - type of tool (endmill, ball nose etc.)
      toolSeries - - the series of the tool as stated by the manufacturer.
      toolTeeth - - number of teeth that the tool has
      toolLength - - the total length of the tool
      Returns:
      the id of the newly created CuttingTool

    • getCuttingTool

      public CuttingTool getCuttingTool​(int toolId)
      Parameters:
      toolId - - the id of the tool to retrieve
      Returns:
      the retrieved tool

    • getAllCuttingTools

      public List<CuttingTool> getAllCuttingTools()
      Returns:
      a List containing all tools in database

    • updateCuttingTool

      public void updateCuttingTool​(int toolId, String toolName, String toolType, String toolSeries, int toolTeeth, double toolLength)
      Parameters:
      toolId - - the id of the tool to update
      toolName - - description for the tool
      toolType - - type of tool (endmill, ball nose etc.)
      toolSeries - - the series of the tool as stated by the manufacturer.
      toolTeeth - - number of teeth that the tool has
      toolLength - - the total length of the cutting tool

    • deleteCuttingTool

      public void deleteCuttingTool​(int toolId)
      Parameters:
      toolId - - the id of the tool to delete
